caller_intent: Britt Wells wants to cancel her auto, umbrella, and home insurance policies with Penn National and understand associated fees, particularly short-rate fees for auto insurance, and coordinate the effective date of cancellation.
resolution_steps: Agent explains Penn National's short-rate fee structure for auto insurance (based on remaining months) and full refunds for home/umbrella policies.
Agent confirms cancellation effective September 1st, aligning with the start date of a new policy.
Agent arranges for Corbin to locate and share policy details about cancellation terms.
Agent clarifies that policy documents outline cancellation terms in the 'definitions' section and under 'contract cancellation' clauses.
knowledge_required: Insurance cancellation policies (short-rate fees, billing cycles, refund rules)
Policy document structure (e.g., 'definitions' section, cancellation clauses)
Coordination with internal team members (e.g., Corbin) for document retrieval
summary: Britt Wells seeks to cancel her Penn National insurance policies and clarify cancellation fees. The agent explains short-rate fees for auto insurance, full refunds for home/umbrella policies, and coordinates with Corbin to provide policy details. They agree to cancel all policies effective September 1st, aligning with a new policy start date.
